name: Null Void Beam
description: By harnessing the entropic nature of the Null Void, this beam can actually destroy energy.

name: Entropic Recursion
description: The universe tends irresistibly onwards and downwards. That tendency cannot be reversed... but it can be subverted, for a price.

name: Doctrine: Strange Loop
description: A set of social protocols based on paradoxical intuition, and on love. When we know the System of the Loop, we learn that we can influence by receiving instructions, as well as giving them.

children.name: Omega Theory
children.description: When a temporal paradox becomes tangled, a kind of consciousness arises, with its own needs, its own desires. This is what has occurred with the consciousness that some call the Worm-in-Waiting. If we can align ourselves with that consciousness, we might just achieve a kind of immortality.

name: Omega Theory
description: When a temporal paradox becomes tangled, a kind of consciousness arises, with its own needs, its own desires. This is what has occurred with the consciousness that some call the Worm-in-Waiting. If we can align ourselves with that consciousness, we might just achieve a kind of immortality.

name: Amoeba Breeding Program
description: By breeding Space Amoebas in captivity, we can program their symbiotic flagella to act as organic strike craft for our navy.

name: Star Cracker
description:
A beam of directed tachyon energy is fired into the star, triggering a supernova. The incredible energy released by this event is then used to generate vast quantities of dark matter.

§RWhen the star detonates, ALL colonies, megastructures, and stations in the system are destroyed - including our own. All fleets in the system will go MIA. The Star-Eater itself is the only exception.§!
potential: Has DLC Nemesis
Has Become the Crisis Ascension Perk
Has the can_build_star_eaters country flag

name: Crystal-Infused Plating
description: By infusing armor plating with Crystalline matter we are able to further increase the durability of our ships' protective hulls.
weight_modifiers: (+5.0) Has the crystal_armor_1_weight country flag

name: Crystal-Forged Plating
description: Introducing Crystalline matter into the forging process further improves the ultra-hard qualities of crystal-infused metals.

name: Artificial Dragonscales
description: The Ether Drake's scales are made up of multiple layers of unique mineral nanostructures. Unorthodox manufacturing techniques allow us to closely emulate these self-repairing structures.

name: Dyson Sphere
description: A Dyson Sphere fully envelops a given star, converting all solar output directly to Energy Credits.
potential: Has DLC Utopia

name: Enigmatic Decoder
description: While producing average results in standard tests, the accuracy of Enigmatic Decoder's prediction algorithms seemingly increases as the target's flight path grows more erratic.

name: Enigmatic Encoder
description: The Enigmatic Encoder scrambles flight path data according to some indeterminable design before feeding it back to fleet command.

name: Extradimensional Weaponry
description: Applying 5th-dimensional energy manipulation principles on lower dimensional planes allows for the creation of powerful energy weapons.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Does NOT have the Covenant: End of the Cycle modifier
(×1.5) Has Technological Ascendancy Ascension Perk

(×2.0) Federation :
• Has Federation Perk : Scientific Inspiration
• Any Federation Member :
• Has Technology: Extradimensional Weaponry

name: Gargantuan Evolution
description: Voidspawn eggs have evolved to withstand the harsh conditions of space by absorbing and conserving energy from their nearest star.

name: L-Gate Activation
description: The L-Gates defy our current understanding of subspace mechanics. This must be remedied before they can be opened for travel.
potential: Does NOT have the l_cluster_opened global flag

name: Matter Decompressor
description: The Matter Decompressor lenses a black hole's gravity, forming a drill of gravitational forces to retrieve Minerals from the singularity.
potential: Has DLC Megacorp

name: Mining Drone Lasers
description: Using strong-focus lenses in combination with an oscillating firing frequence help create lasers strong enough to mine asteroids, or shoot down hostiles.

name: Nanite Autocannon
description: Highly advanced autocannons capable of ejecting shells that explode into a cloud of nanites at the target, overwhelming shields and chewing through hull sections.

name: Nanite Flak Battery
description: Improving upon previous designs by launching canisters of nanites capable of eating away at strike craft, these flak batteries are the bane of any fighter pilot.

name: Nanite Repair System
description: A highly effective hull auto-repair system comprised of billions of microscopic nanomachines was found among the smoking remains of the Scavenger, and has been repurposed for our uses. Whether the Scavenger pilfered this system from an ancient derelict, or was originally constructed with it remains unknown.

name: Neural Tissue Engineering
description: When tailored to a species' genome, this form of tissue engineering has intensive neuroregenerative properties, significantly increasing the development of neurons, axons, and synapses in its recipient.

name: Orbital Trash Dispersal
description: This orbital bombardment management system spams a planet with millions of minute, high-velocity projectiles, overwhelming planetside defensive grids with trash data. Ships equipped with this component will cause more damage during orbital bombardment.

name: Numistic Data Modeling
description: Are the precognitive powers of Numa at work or is it a matter of skilled craftsmanship? Either way this galactic stock market prediction model will forecast fluctuations in the economy with divine accuracy.

name: Psionic Barrier
description: These barriers are generated out of pure psychic energy by a cadre of psionic specialists. They will be able to stop some incoming fire, like our Energy deflector systems, but without the prohibitive power consumption.

name: Psionic Shields
description: These extremely powerful shields are generated out of pure psychic energy by a cadre of psionic specialists. Their powers are further augmented by large arrays of psi emitters.

name: Regenerative Hull Tissue
description: A genetically altered version of silicon-based bacteria could potentially be manipulated to regenerate non-organic materials.

name: Ring World
description: A Ring World allows for multiple planet-like zones, cannibalizing all other planets in the system for materials.
potential: Has DLC Utopia

name: Scourge Missiles
description: By analyzing the biological weaponry employed by the Swarm we can create self-propelled projectiles weapons spreading the very same horrific destruction.

name: Cloud Lightning Conduits
description: Void Clouds use the electrical charges generated by the dense gases that make up most of their core to release bolts of burning plasma. Using the same gas composition together with a specialized conduit allows for powerful lightning weaponry.

name: Frequency Tuning
description: Adapting the Tiyanki method of siphoning energy from gaseous matter, it is possible to construct weapons draining energy from enemy ships.

name: Swarm Spawning Pools
description: Collecting specimens from defeated Prethoryn enables us to clone and genetically program a war-brood of our own.

name: Cybrex Mining Hub
description: To build their ring world, the Cybrex relied on highly efficient mining drones to survey and harvest orbital resources. Cybrex-made memory chips and sensors could outfit our own mining drones, so that we might put their millennia old algorithms to good use.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: First League Filing Offices
description: The sprawling empire of the First League dwarfed our own at its peak, and relied on implacable bureaucracy to keep the wheels of the state in motion. The quantic filing arrays they used afforded them unprecedented efficiency in the sorting and storing of documents.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Irassian Naval Yards
description: The Irassian astronaval tradition was unmatched in their time. Their shipyards produced a constant stream of ships for their navy and merchant fleets, which would ultimately be their downfall. With so many ships, and such a high reliance on them, the Irassians were powerless to quarantine the disease that would claim their empire.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Vultaum Reality Computer
description: The reality computers of the Vultaums were unique processing units, dedicated to analyzing existence itself, not quite through physics, but rather by trying to reverse engineer reality's source code and find the glitch that would finally allow the Vultaums to take down the simulation where they believed they lived.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Yuht Astronomical Interferometer
description: The Yuht were a paradoxical society, obsessed with the idea of finding other sentient species, yet refusing to accept that they were not alone. They were so focused on disproving any claim of alien life, that their bias found a way into their technology. However, with the proper modifications and calibrations, we could certainly fix their powerful detection arrays.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Baol Organic Plant
description: The Baol Organism had a unique way of producing tools. Given the species' relative slowness, they would simply grow them out of organic matter in locations that were half orchard, half factory. With the proper genetic adjustments, we could also grow various commodities and tools alongside our regular crops.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Zroni Storm Caster
description: Zro is a fascinating element prone to chaotic bursts of energy. We believe that with the right artifacts we could use it to fuel spatial storms over entire solar systems.
potential: Has DLC Ancient Relics Story Pack

name: Skravird Strike Craft
description: Zro is a fascinating element prone to chaotic bursts of energy. We believe that with the right artifacts we could use it to fuel spatial storms over entire solar systems.
potential: Has DLC Paragon
Has Legendary Leader Skrand Sharpbeak recruited

name: Mark of the Composer
description: The mark of our Shroud Patron amplifies our psionic abilities and allows us to influence entire ships

name: Mark of the Eater
description: The mark of our Shroud Patron amplifies our psionic abilities and allows us to influence entire ships

name: Mark of the Instrument
description: The mark of our Shroud Patron amplifies our psionic abilities and allows us to influence entire ships

name: Mark of the Whisperers
description: The mark of our Shroud Patron amplifies our psionic abilities and allows us to influence entire ships

name: Techniques of the Hunt
description: We have studied the techniques and biology of the Hunters and have applied those skills to improve our existing forces.

name: Coral World Adaptation
description: Our studies in the history of the Coral World's history have led us to new techniques to thrive on worlds with wetter climates.

name: Coral World Adaptation
description: Our studies in the history of the Coral World's history have led us to new techniques to thrive on worlds with drier climates.

name: Composed Strands
description: The genetic plague left by the Temple of Strands has left our genome more open to genetic manipulation.

name: Secrets of the Synthetic Lifeforms
description: The AI, Unit 04, has shared with us its years of knowledge about building robots and genetics.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Any Owned Planet
	    •   Is Techno-Organic World
	    •   Is Techno-Arcology

name: Unit 04's Secrets
description: The AI known as Unit 04 may have been shut down, but studying its memory banks will teach us about engineering and robotics for years to come.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Any Owned Planet
	    •   Is Techno-Organic World
	    •   Is Techno-Arcology

name: Unit 04's Legacy
description: Working with Unit 04 we have created a powerful positronic brain that we can install in any robot body, which has shown an intrinsic understanding of engineering and has amazing potential for almost all applications as its modelled off the best parts of both organic and machine brains.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Any Owned Planet
	    •   Is Techno-Organic World
	    •   Is Techno-Arcology

name: Hive Genetics
description: Unit 04 has given us knowledge that will allow us to genetically adapt ourselves like never before.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Any Owned Planet
	    •   Is Techno-Organic World
	    •   Is Techno-Arcology

name: Cyber-Labratory Network
description: Using the MWF-14 world as a network hub, we should be able to create several cybernetic focus laboratories which will further our knowledge on relevant subjects and boost our robotic assembly speed.
potential:
Any Owned Planet
• Is The MWF-14 World

name: Non-Standard Archaeologist Safety Gear
description: Allowing your archaeologists to chose their own gear and protection based on the site they are exploring gives the best chance of success!

name: Triple Probe Search Patterns
description: Utilising an optimised search pattern involving three probes simultaneously vastly increases our ability to scan the surfaces of worlds.

name: Energy Recycling Conduits
description: New thermal recycling systems in energy conduits allow for more efficient power transfer. Unfortunately this new technology works best in vacuum environments and are very fragile so they are best suited for stationary designs.

name: Energy Field Theories
description: New theories on energy fields will have a positive effect on our ability to generate energy.

name: Non-Emissive Observation Stations
description: A special coating of ultra-black radio-frequency absorbing material renders our observation station and satellites virtually invisible.

name: Deep Space Signal Boosters
description: Self-Powered deep space satellites act as a boosting system for long range communication. These boosters allow for far more efficient planning over long distances.

name: Inspiring Designs
description: Highly cost-efficient and beautiful architectural designs.

name: Algorithmic Planning
description: Seemingly complex city planning created by advanced algorithms.

name: Fractal Manufacturing
description: Using new manufacturing techniques to print smaller components with fractal meshes allows us to save on materials.

name: Rapid Exchange Units
description: Tiny robotic arms, fitted with their own basic-AI units, allow for much more efficient exchanging of components with far less material waste.

name: Quantum Predictive Algorithms
description: Specialised quantum computer-chips are much more efficient in predicting where a target will be.

name: Aerogel Cooling Plating
description: Special carbon aerogel plating can be applied to our weapon systems allowing them to fire more rapid without causing internal damage from overheating.

name: Portable Forcefields
description: Advanced forcefield emitters allow for them to be much more easily deployed.

name: Defensive Experience
description: The vast defensive lines and bunkers found on the precursor world allow for much more intense and realistic combat training. Expertise on assaulting defensive positions as well as protecting defensive positions is quickly gained.

name: Mining Mechs
description: Small mechs fitted with two high-powered mining drills can cut through any type of rock they encounter.

name: Autonomous Reload Arms
description: Tiny autonomous robotic arms quickly reload the small self-defence systems of our ships.

name: Shield Frequency Modulators
description: Specialised modulators create waves in our shields giving them extra strength against direct impacts.

name: Wide-Channel Shield Conduits
description: Large open channel conduits allow for vastly more power to run through the shield emitters, causing our shields to regain strength faster.

name: Gravity Anchors
description: Gravitational anchors reduce the amount of stress structures experience from their own weight. They allow for much taller and wider structures to be build.

name: Micro Gravity Fields
description: Small emitters produce a localised anti-gravity field which allows structures to have far extruding platforms and sections without collapsing.

name: Bureaucratic Protocols
description: Standardised efficient protocols allow for decisions to go through a governance system faster then before.

name: Diplomatic Appeasement Techniques
description: Through genuine interest or not, we can reduce the perceived threat to our neighbours by acting slightly condescending. A diplomatic technique that just works universally. We are perceived as the parent, rather than the aggressive sibling.

name: Time-Crystal Storage
description: Artificial Time-Crystals do not degrade and can be used to store vast amounts of knowledge. All the knowledge and instructions a new colony could need to grown and expand.

name: Deep-Space Relay Stations
description: Efficient and self-powered relay stations to boost signals coming from the borders of our empire.

name: Master-Database
description: Specialised Database containing the entirety of our empires scientific knowledge. Specialised algorithms to look up data makes it easier to cross-reference scientific information.

name: Personal Singularity Assistant
description: A miniatures simple version of the singularity drive is used as a personal assistant. Though simple in form the personal drive can calculate extremely complex tasks if asked.

name: Orbital Camouflage
description: A unique way of constructing buildings using various angles and colours based on the surroundings of structures can make them very difficult to see from orbit.

name: Polar Garrisons
description: Insight into precursor warfare leads us to believe polar invasions is a much more common strategy than we first thought.

name: Drone Watchers
description: Tiny drones that patrol the streets, much like their immobile static variant: the traffic camera.

name: Prison Planet Propaganda
description: A stark reminder that prison planets are not a fun time. Fear of being shipped to one is enough to keep most citizens in line.
potential: Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

name: Mineral Sensor Field
description: Sensor field capable of finding even the smallest and deepest veins of minerals.

name: Tunnelling Nanites
description: Tiny machines designed to dig deep tunnels towards mineral veins. These automated machines construct highly complex and strong tunnels capable of going deeper than ever before.

name: Cold Foundries
description: High-pressure cryosystems are embedded in our alloy forges allowing them to cast hot metal in rapid succession.

name: Zero-G Belts
description: Anti-gravity fields can carry materials and finished produces from one part of the factory to the other in any direction without the need of physical installations. Multiple production chains can be fitted in a very small space.

name: Artifact Emissions
description: Discovery of unique subspace emissions coming from these artifacts allows us to detect them from large distances away. The galaxy is full of them, we just have to pick them up!

name: Ancient Vault Treasure Map
description: Hidden in a compartment of one of the artifacts found was a map. A map leading to a hidden vault within our territories on an ancient moon. Expeditions have already be sent out.

name: Self-Assembly Starbase Modules
description: Highly modular systems allow starbases to cheaply change their configurations.

name: Starbase Heat Recycling
description: Vast network of thermal transfer nodes allow the starbase to efficiently recyle waste heat.

name: Plasma Rifles
description: Soldiers equipped with plasma rifles fire a beam of plasma, which is an excited state of matter consisting of atomic electrons & nuclei and free electrons, causing unprecedented damage to whatever they hit.

name: Plasma Throwers
description: Plasma throwers fire a cone-shaped stream of plasma causing everything it touches to instantly vaporise into a cloud of super-heated gas. Being on the receiving end of a plasma thrower is the most frightening experience a soldier will ever have.

name: Subspace Sensors
description: Sensors capable of peering into subspace can detect the warp signatures of ships further away then conventional sensors.

name: Command Outposts
description: Specialises military command outposts allow for fleets to better coordinate with central command. As a result, committing more assets to the front lines becomes a lot easier.

name: Auto Fisheries
description: Automated harbour fisheries provide an endless supply of food without negatively effecting the environment.
potential: Does NOT have Machine Intelligence Authority

name: Nanite Fluid Filters
description: Energetic fluid filters that pull fluids through their nanite latices creating drinkable liquids.

name: Precursor Theories
description: A vast databank of precursor gained knowledge will help us out with newer discoveries.

name: Fast And Loose
description: Disregarding some complex guidelines when exploring for ancient relics is necessary to beat our rivals to discoveries.

name: Terraforming Obelisk
description: Piecing together broken artifacts has lead us to the discovery of it's primary use. It was a terraforming obelisk. A tall building designed to filter, heat, and spread various gases and fluids over an area of a planet in order to terraform it.

name: A.I. Personal Device
description: One of the artifacts analysed by our chief scientist is a small obelisk, roughly the size of a cup. It's primary purpose seems to be to assist in calculating complex problems that were imputed.

name: Core Fluid Dynamics
description: A better understanding of the convection currents around the planet's core greatly benefits our capacity to terraform.

name: Volcanic Creation
description: Terraforming theory about the creation of artificial volcanoes on strategic locations to trigger a temporary global winter. Trapping Particles in the atmosphere and heating the planet up can drastically reducing the energy requirements to terraform a world.

name: Climate Theories
description: Studying the many different climates on the discovered gaia world has lead to some interesting theories on the existence of exotic climates. This knowledge will greatly benefit our ability adapt to our environments.

name: Indestructible Beans
description: Discovery of a new type of bean that can grow almost anywhere and has a high nutritional content. This new food will greatly benefit our ability to feed our colonies.
potential: Does NOT have Machine Intelligence Authority

name: Elder Envy
description: The discovery of the holy signals on the recently discovered gaia world has given our government the push it needed to fund scientific research in all areas. We must discover and match these ancient empires.

name: Existential Counselling
description: The news that there are ancient elder civilisations in our galaxy has shaken our society. Counselling is best offered to help our people with this existential dread.

name: Anti-Gravity Boosters
description: The news that there are ancient elder civilisations in our galaxy has shaken our society. Counselling is best offered to help our people with this existential dread.

name: Gravitational Ejectors
description: The anti-gravity injector system creates a strong gravitational push on loaded projectiles allowing them to be fired at much higher velocities.

name: Speeder Tactics
description: Studying the ancient battlefields have revealed that the use of fast speeder or bike units to flank positions still has great value in modern warfare.

name: Supply-Line Sabotage
description: Studies have shown that sabotaging supply-lines have a much more detrimental effect on enemy morale than disrupting them or destroying them.

name: Standard Compartment Templates
description: Standard construction templates for ship sections greatly reduces their fabrication cost over time.

name: Superstructure Bulkheads
description: Standard construction templates for ship sections greatly reduces their fabrication cost over time.

name: Self Replication
description: Carefully controlled nanites are allowed to replicate themselves, giving us an infinite supply of nanites to be used elsewhere.

name: Nanite Coolant
description: Nanite coolant is capable of keeping itself cold, so cold it can stay near sub-zero temperatures forever. It does this by actively transferring heat from it's environment and retaining that heat in hyper-efficient thermal cells.

name: Pleasure Droids
description: While not officially supported, pleasure droids are so widespread they are impossible to forbid at this point. A thriving black market has resulted in one being in nearly every home, though none would admit to owning one.
potential: Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

name: Droid Servants
description: Uniquely docile and suggestive AI are used to construct the best personal servants the galaxy has ever seen.

name: Archaeological Seeker Drone
description: Model 32-B-Short-Round is a highly adaptive and reliable drone capable of seeking out unnatural items in the most dangerous and inaccessible places.

name: Archaeological AI
description: Specialised constructed AI to assist in analysing the multitude of clues found on digs.

name: Crystal Growth Catalysts
description: A combination of exotic chemicals that greatly increase the growth-rate of artificially created crystal structures.

name: Fractal Refraction
description: Artificial crystals with an infinite fractal pattern are the absolute best way to focus energy at a target by means of refraction.

name: Plasma Fields
description: By creating a stable plasma field around weapon's fire we can ensure they have a higher probability of penetrating armour.

name: Radon Plasma Manufacturing
description: Using radon gas, a highly stable and non-reactant material, and super heating it to plasma has remarkable applications in the manufacturing areas of non-stable elements.

name: Ritual Of Insight
description: An ancient scroll speaks of a ritual that gives insights into the very nature of the universe..

name: Ritual Of Sacrifice
description: An ancient scroll speaks of a ritual that prolongs life.. at a cost.

name: Alien Fruits
description: Fast growing exotic trees that produce succulent juicy orange fruits ready to eat.
potential: Does NOT have Machine Intelligence Authority

name: Healing Flowers
description: Otherworldly flowers with remarkable healing properties. These flowers are incredible delicate and require permanent care to grow and harvest.
potential: Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

name: Self-Regenerating Slime
description: A thin living slime layer can be applied around any material to give it a self-repairing protective layer. This slime is increadably hardy and can survive the harsh conditions of space.

name: Gas Pods
description: Biological growths that periodically produce a rare stable gas as a by-product of their metabolism.

name: Arachnid DNA
description: What could possibly go wrong cloning some ancient predator.

name: Pack Behaviour Studies
description: Unique insights into pack behaviour of arachnids have lead to some interesting new methodologies for studying other species.

name: Dense Exoscales
description: Giant scales periodically Shedd from the recently discovered giant worms can be used to reinforce the weaker spots in the armour of our ships.

name: Mining Worms
description: Domesticated giant worms can be used to dig massive tunnels. These worms are brought to our colonies when they are still in their eggs. Careful nurturing is key in making sure they only dig where we want them to dig.

name: Ethics Education
description: The discovery of the planet full of bones has cause quite a stir in all layers of our society. To prevent ourselves ever getting into a situation that could result into such horror we have introduced permanent and highly focused ethics teachings. We must never make the same mistakes that were made on the planet of bones.
potential: Does NOT have Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

name: Collateral Dread
description: Fear of causing mass deaths and collateral damage just to strike an enemy target have led to incredibly smart ammunitions and weapon systems. Strike hard, strike accurate and strike only the enemy!

name: Incubation
description: Careful management of the eggs that were found allows us to grow more of these creatures.

name: Private Benefactors
description: Some discoveries are so unique and interesting that they practically invite private investors.

name: Shroom For The Dead
description: Giant Mushroom forests are the ideal place to get rid of the dead. The rate at which these large fungals eat the corpses is unprecedented and makes disposing of them a safe and environmentally friendly option.
potential: Does NOT have Machine Intelligence Authority

name: Blue Fungal
description: A strange blue mushroom has been discovered to have unique virile boosting properties. Above all they appear to be highly addictive and wanted amongst the population.
potential: Does NOT have Machine Intelligence Authority

name: Manufacuring Maximization
description: Integrating some automation in the decision making process of manufacturing is bound to have a positive effect.

name: Lossless Ship Relays
description: Understanding the energy states of precursor relay grids is a difficult task, but a worthwhile one.

name: Matrix Duplication
description: We know how to copy its design and materials, but we don't know how it works exactly. By duplicating the matrix and copying over the energy state we can effectively create more.

name: Machines of War
description: Our engineers have developed special battle machines to be fielded on the battlefields. These bipedal robotic walkers can be equipped with larger weapons and heavier armour that our usual troops.
potential: Has Mechanicum Tradition
